cave_pass.name: Cave Pass
cave_pass.description: Allows passage into the sealed cave beyond.

gem.name: Gem
gem.description: A luminous gem dropped by the fire-dragonling Ronington.

rusty_axe.name: Rusty Axe
rusty_axe.description: An old but functional axe. It can break apart worn-down objects.

wood.name: Wood
wood.description: A sturdy piece of lumber, could be useful.
